assignments.description: Adds uploadResults from Apex response to Apex Defined Variable
assignments.name: Apex_Upload_Results_Assignment
assignments.label: Apex Upload Results Assignment

assignments.description: Adds formatted results to ApexResult variable
assignments.name: ApexResult_Assignment
assignments.label: ApexResult Assignment

assignments.description: Adds detail entered into Document Detail Screen into a temporary External Document record variable
assignments.name: External_Document_Record_Assignment
assignments.label: External Document Record Assignment

assignments.description: Adds External Document from previous assignment to record collection
assignments.name: External_Document_to_Upload_Collection_Assignment
assignments.label: External Document to Upload Collection Assignment

assignments.description: Adds Hub Account Record Not Found message to FaultMessage
assignments.name: Fault_Message_Assignment_Hub_Account_Record_Not_Found
assignments.label: Fault Message Assignment: Hub Account Record Not Found

value.stringValue: Unable to upload Document(s) as the related Student Account does not have an associated Hub Account record.

assignments.description: Adds No Documents Returned message to FaultMessage
assignments.name: Fault_Message_Assignment_No_Documents_Returned
assignments.label: Fault Message Assignment: No Documents Returned

value.stringValue:
Document(s) failed to Upload.
Please contact a System Administrator.

assignments.description: Updates variables related to missing file and stores entered file details in separate variables
assignments.name: No_File_Uploaded_Assignment
assignments.label: No File Uploaded Assignment

value.stringValue: Unable to upload Document as none have been selected.

assignments.description: Resets temp External Document record and User inputted file details. Clears reusable collections and resets boolean values to default
assignments.name: Record_Variable_Assignment
assignments.label: Record Variable Assignment

assignments.description: Adds Hub Account Has No Auth0Id Value message to FaultMessage
assignments.name: Update_Fault_Message_Hub_Account_Has_No_Auth0Id_Value
assignments.label: Update Fault Message: Hub Account Has No Auth0Id Value

value.stringValue: Unable to upload Document(s) as the related Student Account's Hub Account record has no Auth0 Id value.

assignments.description: Updates UploadCount variable to the count of the uploaded ContentDocumentIds collection
assignments.name: Upload_Count_Assignment
assignments.label: Upload Count Assignment

assignments.description: Iterates UploadIteration and resets UploadCount variables
assignments.name: Upload_Variable_Assignment
assignments.label: Upload Variable Assignment

constants.description: As the UploadIteration variable starts at 0, this limit is the (desired limit - 1)
constants.name: UploadFileLimit

decisions.description: Checks if the User has specified if they want to upload more than one file. If a User has reached the UploadFileLimit, the process will end
decisions.name: Does_User_Want_To_Upload_More_Files
decisions.label: Does User Want To Upload More Files?

decisions.description: Checks that the UploadCount has a value greater than 0. If it does, the upload process will run. If it doesn't, the User is taken back to the Document Detail screen.
decisions.name: Has_File_Been_Uploaded
decisions.label: Has File Been Uploaded?

decisions.description: Checks if Opportunity's related Account has an associated Hub Account record
decisions.name: Has_Related_Hub_Account_Record
decisions.label: Has Related Hub Account Record?

decisions.description: Checks if any Content Document records have been retrieved in the previous Get Records component
decisions.name: Have_Content_Document_Records_Been_Created
decisions.label: Have Content Document Records Been Created?

decisions.description: Checks if response from Apex Action contains info in it's uploadResults variable
decisions.name: Have_Results_Been_Returned
decisions.label: Have Results Been Returned?

decisions.description: Checks Hub Account record exists or, if it does exist, checks if Hub Account record has an Auth0 Id value
decisions.name: Hub_Account_Record_Not_Found_or_Has_No_Auth0Id_Value
decisions.label: Hub Account Record Not Found or Has No Auth0Id Value

rules.name: Hub_Account_Has_No_Auth0Id_Value
rules.label: Hub Account Has No Auth0Id Value

formulas.name: fxDecisionFormat
formulas.expression: IF({!Apex_Results_Loop.inserted} = TRUE, ('' & 'Document created.' & ''), ('' & 'Document failed to be created.' & ''))

loops.description: Loops through the results from the Apex action
loops.name: Apex_Results_Loop
loops.label: Apex Results Loop

recordDeletes.description: Deletes all Content Document Records that were retrieved in the Get Records component
recordDeletes.name: Delete_Content_Document_Records
recordDeletes.label: Delete Content Document Records

recordLookups.description: Retrieves any Content Document records that have been created so far
recordLookups.name: Get_Content_Document_Records
recordLookups.label: Get Content Document Records

recordLookups.description: Retrieves ContentVersion records via inserted Content Document Id
recordLookups.name: Get_ContentVersion_Records
recordLookups.label: Get ContentVersion Records

screens.description: Screen for entering information about each file a User is uploading
screens.name: Document_Details
screens.label: Document Details

fields.name: Document_Details_Instruction_Text
fields.fieldText: Please populate the following fields for the file you wish to upload:

fields.name: Document_Details_Education_History_Text
fields.fieldText: As your document type relates to Education History, please fill in the following fields:

value.stringValue: Please select a Qualification Institution record:
Please select a Qualification Type record:
Yes - Once saved, the form will refresh
No - I don't want to upload more documents

screens.description: Shows success/failure message to User at the end of the process
screens.name: Results_Screen
screens.label: Results Screen

fields.name: Result_Limit_Hit_Text
fields.fieldText:
You are unable to upload more than {!UploadFileLimit} files in one instance of this pop-up.

If you wish to upload more files, please click the Finish button and then select the Upload Document button from the Opportunity again.

fields.name: Results_Success_Text
fields.fieldText:
Upload File results:


{!ResultMessage}

fields.name: Results_Failure_Text
fields.fieldText:
Something went wrong:


{!FaultMessage}

variables.description: Fault message to display to the User in case something goes wrong.
variables.name: FaultMessage
